aboutMe.title: about me
aboutMe.item1: I am a very responsible person, I like teamwork and sharing the knowledge I have unconditionally.
aboutMe.item2: Although my professional experience in the field of computing is not much, I can bring a desire to learn and interest. I like the work well done.
